GithubAPI.title: GitHub Repositories
GithubAPI.text:
You can find below all of my Github public repositories.

This page uses v3 GitHub REST API to display in one view page details of my projects. This project aimed to manage updates of my portfolio / releases notes with my GitHub repositories automatically.
GithubAPI.page: <iframe src='https://realvincentberthet.github.io/github-api/'' name='targetframe' allowTransparency='true' scrolling='no' frameborder='0' width='100%'' height='100%'' ></iframe>

Orium.name: Orium
Orium.description: Orium project game design, made on Unreal Engine

Isati Game Jam 2K19.name: Isati Game Jam 2K19
Isati Game Jam 2K19.description:
Trailer of the first Game Jam of ESIR in partnership with Orange Applications for Business

Winner : Game Jam of Thrones

Trailer made by Vincent Berthet

LunaAndHelios.title: Luna & Helios (WebGL)
LunaAndHelios.name: A Story of Luna & Helios
LunaAndHelios.description:
This game has been released during the Orange Game Jam 2020. The aim of this event was to build a video game in 35 hours on the subject : Safe in the dark

More informations are available in the GitHub README

Gameplay video

Kubic.title: Kubic (WebGL)
Kubic.name: Kubic
Kubic.description:
No streaming access is available on WebGL with Unity.
As this game has been developed for OS, use Windows executable to have access to options and sounds and others features in the game

More informations are available in the GitHub README
